title: Termination of custodianship
context: [ยง553A-20] Termination of custodianship. The custodian shall transfer in an appropriate manner the custodial property to the minor or to the minor&rsquo;s estate upon the earlier of: (1) The minor&rsquo;s attainment of twenty-one years of age with respect to custodial property transferred under section 553A-4 or 553A-5; (2) The minor&rsquo;s attainment of age eighteen with respect to custodial property transferred under section 553A-6 or 553A-7; or (3) The minor&rsquo;s death. [L 1985, c 91, pt of ยง1]
